typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		loan_id as integer,
		account_id as integer,
		date as string,
		amount as integer,
		duration as integer,
		payments as decimal(10,0),
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dbo.loan.csv']) ~> LoanData
source(output(
		account_sk as integer,
		alternate_account_id as integer,
		district_key as integer,
		frequency as string,
		datekey as integer,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> AccountDW
source(output(
		DateSK as integer,
		Date as timestamp,
		Day as integer,
		MonthName as string,
		MonthNumber as integer,
		CalendarMonthLabel as string,
		Year as integer,
		ISOWeekNumber as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> DimDate
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimLoan
DerivedColumns, AccountDW lookup(account_id == alternate_account_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(alternate_account_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
LoanData derive(insertDate = currentTimestamp(),
		updateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		dateString = toString(toDate(toString(date))),
		currentFlag = 1) ~> DerivedColumns
DimDate derive(DerivedDate = toString(toDate(toString(toTimestamp(toString(Date, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS"), "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS"))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
Lookup1, DerivedColumn1 lookup(dateString == DerivedDate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Year, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		loan_sk as integer,
		alternate_loan_id as integer,
		account_key as integer,
		date_key as integer,
		amount as integer,
		duration as integer,
		payments as decimal(7,2),
		status as string,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		current_flag as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		alternate_loan_id = loan_id,
		account_key = account_sk,
		date_key = DateSK,
		amount,
		duration,
		payments,
		status,
		insert_date = insertDate,
		modified_date = updateDate,
		start_date = insertDate,
		current_flag = currentFlag
	)) ~> sink1
